release.action: Removed gettext invocation from goal merge to allow merging files, that were not extracted by this plugin.
Added configuration options for merge to control entry-order. This way it is possible to check in the po-files too scm and have them generated and merged by the CI.
Write list of sources to file instead of passing them on the command line to avoid overflow.
First release of the Maven Gettext Plugin for Maven 2.0.
